resources.string:
What's new with the app:

 - Notifications are now available to allow 'real time' tracking without having to be in the app.
 - Toggle notifications in Settings
 - Ability to set ongoing notifications
 - The app will update the Blood Alcohol Content in the notification bar ONLY if the app is left running in the background (to give you control on automatic refreshing)

 - Please give me feedback, I appreciate hearing from you!

Thanks for Downloading!

This app is intended for entertainment purposes only. The content and information displayed in this app should not be your deciding factor for determining blood alcohol content while drinking. Only you know how much you have really had. Please drink responsibly. The owners of this app claim no responsibility for the actions of the end users of this product. By clicking \'OK\' you (the end user) agree that the owners of this app are not liable for any actions of the end user(s).
